dict.acceptation: 番茄，西红柿；[俚语] 美女；

sent.orig: Technically, a tomato a fruit -- the fruit of the tomato plant.
sent.trans: 从技术上来说番茄是水果，是番茄植株的果实。

sent.orig: Prepare tomato salsa by mixing tomato, garlic, onion basil leaves, lemon juice, olive oil and seasoning.
sent.trans: 用开水烫过蔬菜和意大利面条，再用橄榄油炒，并进行调味。

sent.orig: Technically, a tomato a fruit. The -- the fruit of the tomato plant.
sent.trans: 从专业角度来讲，番茄是水果，是番茄植株的果实。

sent.orig: Using tomato as material, produce a kind of tomato vinegar through alcohol ferment and acetic acid-ferment.
sent.trans: 研究了以番茄为主要原料，经过酒精发酵和醋酸发酵生产番茄醋。

sent.orig: Summarized study on salt tolerance of tomato about physiological, gene, salt mutant and transgenic tomato.
sent.trans: 摘要对国内外番茄耐盐生理、与耐盐性相关的基因、耐盐突变体及其转基因耐盐番茄的研究进展进行了综述。
